description: Values of n for which there are no empty intervals when fractional part(m*phi) for m = 1, ..., n is plotted along [ 0, 1 ] subdivided into n equal regions.
comments: The sequence contains the Fibonacci numbers A000045.
references: Steinhaus, H., Mathematical Snapshots, 3rd American ed., New York: Oxford University Press, pp. 48-49, 1983.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Equidistributed Sequence
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Golden Ratio
mathematica: a = {}; m = {}; Do[AppendTo[a, N[n*GoldenRatio - Floor[n*GoldenRatio], 50]]; a = Sort[a]; b = {0}; Do[AppendTo[b, k/n], {k, 1, n}]; b = Sort[b]; c = 0; Do[If[(a[[k]] < b[[k + 1]]) && (a[[k]] > b[[k]]),[null],c = 1], {k, 1, Length[a]}]; If[c == 0, AppendTo[m, n]], {n, 1, 1000}]; m - _Artur Jasinski_, Dec 27 2007
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
